Without change,
progress is impossible.

That sounds a bit dramatic, doesn’t it? 
But is standing still ever really the best way to advance?

We’re not so sure—which is why our digital solutions are all designed to help you change the way things are.

About Digital Transformation →

Intranets

When you’re grappling with a clunky, out of date intranet, Hadron weeds out inefficiencies and aids communication.

In the end it took just eight weeks from deployment to launch – I couldn't believe how quick the turnaround was. Before Hadron, just 10% of people were ‘completely satisfied’ with our intranet. A year on, we’re at 96%. We have a clear communication structure and the intranet has become part of the language and culture of the Trust.
Learn more

Analytics

When different people need access to different reports and data, Power BI serves them with one complete version of the truth.

Meson takes away the need for very basic reports. The finance guys can now get their reports in two minutes rather than in two days, allowing my team to focus on more complex analytics, such as predictive analytics, rather than telling the organisation what it's just done.
Learn more

Cloud

When moving to the Cloud seems prosperous but daunting, we ensure you reap headache-free rewards.

Moving our SQL Servers into Azure is actually an exciting prospect now. We’re expecting to save £11.3m over the next three years. What's even more exciting is that the investment we'll be making into Office 365 will not only give our staff the freedom to work from wherever they are but the financial investment will be recovered in two months!
Learn more

Would you prefer to talk to a human?

No matter what we say here, you’re probably going to have specific questions you need answered. Send them our way and we’ll make sure you have all the information you need. Just fill in the form below and we’ll get back to you. If it’s of use, we can arrange a convenient time to demonstrate our solutions. And as you’d expect, there’s no obligation or pressure whatsoever.

Digital workspaces

‘Digital workspaces’ are simply digital tools that help your staff do their jobs better. Here are a few of the workspaces we offer.

Intranet

Analytics

People

Business processes

Predictive analytics

Document management

Applications

Project Management Office

Intranet

Hadron is a minimal-configuration intranet built on SharePoint, yet customised for your needs. It’s easy to navigate and makes finding documents and people simple – so it ticks every box you need it to without costing the earth.

Analytics

Power BI makes data visual, intuitive and self-serve, so your colleagues all have access to the timely, relevant statistics. Staff can regulate and improve their own departmental performance, freeing business intelligence teams up to drive organisational progress.

People

Connect is an advanced database housing staff contact details. But Connect also stores information on teams and premises, too. It spreads local knowledge organisation-wide – which is why we refer to it as an employee engagement hub.

Business processes

Interactive, electronic business processes guide staff through uniform procedures. They minimise any human error associated with paper-based procedures and save organisations money compared to paper-based equivalents.

Predictive analytics

Predictive analytics use historical data to predict – with surprising accuracy – what things might look like as the future unfolds. They guide organisations when making big decisions.

Document management

Document management ensures information is easily accessible, properly managed and governed. Reduce your reliance on paper and increase your organisation’s efficiency.

Applications

Applications help staff get more done, fast. Apps like electronic staff records or expenses can be built into Hadron. Or you can design bespoke applications that live in Microsoft’s Cloud.

Project Management Office

Project Management Office helps people manage big projects from a single, digital workspace. Staff get project templates, assigned tasks, notifications and red flags, all of which help them get more done.
